item.description:
SATURDAY APRIL 27 ALL HEART - Rock and Roll Hall Of FAME INDUCTEE HEART TRIBUTE

ALL HEART - THE ULTIMATE HEART TRIBUTE BAND Heart, fronted by Ann and Nancy Wilson,has had numerous chart successes. They achieved Top 10 albums on Billboard in the 1970s, 1980s, 1990s, and in 2010 with chart singles in each decade. This span of four decades, places Heart among the most commercially enduring hard rock acts of all time. All Heart plays all the best of Hearts most popular hits. As a tribute act, All Heart delights its audiences with material that is known and loved from five decades of radio airplay. The Wilson sisters influenced a change in the sceneries of rock by introducing two powerful female leads into the 70s male dominated mainstream. The remarkable vocal similarity between Ann Wilson of Heart and Kathy Quenneville of All Heart will surprise even the most discerning fans. Coupled with Jodee Frawlees sizzle on guitar and vocals, these two women are uniquely qualified to portray rocks most famous sisters. Tom Hansen, Jim Quenneville and Bernard St. Onge round out All Hearts line-up. They recreate the trademark licks and complex repetoire of Hearts dynamic library of popular radio hits with ALL the edge and distinction of HEART.

Only 30 seats available - Tickets are $15
ADVANCE TICKET DISCOUNT - $10 While Supplies Last

At http://www.CTPartyClub.com or call (860) 977-3337



Watch ALL HEART Videos at http://www.CTPartyClub.com
item.how_to_find_us: Pick Up Your Ticket from CT Party Club near the ticket at the ticket desk
